exceptions.exn: In environment x : Rbar P : R -> Prop H : Rbar_locally' x P The term "N" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: intros x. unfold filterlim. intros P [N H]. exists N. intros n Hn. specialize (H n Hn). unfold Rbar_locally' in H. destruct x. - apply H. - destruct (H (INR n)) as [M HM]. exists M. intros y Hy. apply HM. auto. - destruct (H (- INR n)) as [M HM]. exists M. intros y Hy. apply HM. auto.
